name: Chasing Horizons- Airships For Aether
description:
Take to the skies with this 14 page PDF that's all about bringing airships and ship combat into your Aether RPG campaign! Players have multiple options to customize their ship and go on high-flying adventures, and it has quite a bit of room for folks to create their own upgrades and weapons for ships as well! You can customize your ship's Crew specialty, its weapons, its ship Class, specialty rooms that add extra abilities, and the player characters get to be officers with their own extra combat abilities as well. 

This is currently an early draft, which may see some expansion and editing over time, however it is fully playable alongside the core Aether rules as it sits. 

Included in the current version is the 14 page PDF and a fillable Ship Tracker, the first page of which can also be used as a ship stat block for enemies.
